landing.title: Stop guessing why your app broke.
landing.subtitle: Real-time error tracking for developers who care about quality.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to debug faster
landing.feature1Desc: Get notified instantly when errors occur in your application.
landing.feature2Desc: Detailed stack traces with source maps for easy debugging.
landing.feature3Desc: SDKs for Android, iOS, and Kotlin Multiplatform.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.createFirst: Create your first project to start monitoring errors.

project.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your project and all associated error data.
project.everythingLooksGood: Everything looks good! Or the SDK isn't installed yet.

event.eventNotFoundDesc: This event may have been deleted or you don't have permission to view it.
event.actionsLeading: Actions leading up to this error

sdk.title: SDK Integration
sdk.description: Integrate TechMonitor into your application using our SDK.
sdk.quickStartDesc: Send errors to TechMonitor using a simple HTTP POST request. Include your API key in the request body along with error details.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.inviteSentDesc: The user will receive an email with the invitation link.
admin.userAssignedDesc: User has been assigned to the project.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Learn how to integrate, monitor, and scale with TechMonitor.
docs.introContent: TechMonitor is a real-time error tracking and performance monitoring platform designed for modern development teams. It provides deep visibility into application errors, allowing you to fix issues before they impact your users.
docs.getStartedContent: To start monitoring your application, create a new project in the dashboard to receive your unique API key. Then, follow the platform-specific instructions to integrate our SDK into your codebase.
docs.sdkIntegrationContent: Our SDKs are designed to be non-intrusive and lightweight. They automatically capture unhandled exceptions, network errors, and console logs, providing a rich context for every event including breadcrumbs and device information.
docs.errorTrackingContent: Every error reported to TechMonitor includes a full stack trace, source maps support, and environment data. You can filter errors by severity, status, and custom tags to focus on what matters most.
docs.supportText: Our technical support team is available for enterprise customers. For community support, please check our GitHub discussions.
